message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a novel continual learning method that addresses practical challenges in real-world problem domains. The method involves a decomposition of parameters that effectively prevents catastrophic forgetting and order-sensitivity, while being computation- and memory-efficient. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and computational linguistics (cs.CL).
